entries.areabroadcast: <Incoming Emergency Transmission> Mayday - Mayday; This is transport vessel Severed Talon 4 coming in for an emergency landing. Repeat, transport vessel Severed Talon 4 coming in for an emergency landing.
entries.trando_warning: I can't believe this! Oh no... Look out everyone, it's going to blow!
entries.time_is_up: The transponder signal has been lost. The wookiee escaped!
